begin BILL_TT_MountKand04
; quest behaveour for TT_MountKand quest
; basically checks to see if he's been killed

; script location: should be placed on 'atronach_storm_ttmk'

;no longer used. See atronachMountKand

; variables

short deathTest


if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

set deathTest to ( OnDeath )
if ( deathTest == 1 )
	; when we are killed...
	Player->Journal "TT_MountKand" 13		; killed us
endif

end BILL_TT_MountKand04
